detectors.description:
Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SOIL__1.sol#45-51) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balances[msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount > 0 && balances[_to] + _amount > balances[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SOIL__1.sol#46)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SOIL__1.sol#47)
	- balances[_to] += _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SOIL__1.sol#48)

detectors.description:
